Name: HowlinWulf
AboutMe:
I am a Software Developer, Gamer, Philosopher and Musician.

Developer: I am mainly qualified in C# and SQL, but I often work with JavaScript, JQuery, HTML, AJAX and a few others less often.

Gamer: I mainly play World of Warcraft, but I also enjoy Guitar Hero, Rock Band, Sims, Unreal Tournament, Counter-Strike, Minecraft, Mortal Combat, Elder Scrolls (Skyrim), Robot Arena, Warcraft, Starcraft and quite a number of other titles.

Musician: I do not restrict myself to one single genre ever, but the following are some instruments that I play: Guitar, Bass, Drums, Violin, Piano, Keyboard, Recorder and a few others that I probably forgot about while writing this.

I hope to learn a lot from this site, as well as contribute to the knowledge of others.
